text: Chisimu ŵandu ŵaŵagalawiche (kutiila) mwa jenumanja lisiku lyagaasimangene makuga gaŵili (pa ngondo ja Uhudi), chisimu shetani ni juŵatelesyasisye ligongo lya ine (mwa ilemwa) yaŵapanganyisye, sano Allah pamasile paŵakululuchile ŵanganyao, chisimu Allah ni Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwakutulala nnope ntima
